posts.title: My Ninth
posts.body: Safely generating the next id: When determining the next id for a new post, we use the toNumber() function to ensure that we are working with valid numbers. The toNumber() function ensures that if there's an issue with the id of the last post, we fallback to 0, and then increment by 1.
